comments:
When I try to load a resource that contains an Eattribute of Type EString with an embedded space and the ID Attribute = true, references to this instance are not able to be resolved.  If I go into the .XMI file and remove all spaces the resource loads correctly.  

Following is the stack trace: 
rg.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.UnresolvedReferenceException: Unresolved reference 'Order'. (platform:/resource/Production/Production.xmi, 3, 166)

            at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.handleForwardReferences(XMLHandler.java:988)

            at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)

An IDs string value must conform to XML's NCName production and so may not contain spaces. The recent newsgroup thread "Unresolved Reference when not trimmed" has more details.
